Author: Lana_Del_Rayquaza_
Text: I started abusing laxatives like 3 years ago and it's recently gotten out of hand about last year due to me being unable to exercise as often to purge binges.  So I started binging really badly and abusing laxatives more to empty myself and start over essentially, just to turn around and repeat the cycle. Restricting, binging, laxing, restricting, binging, laxing.   I'm sorry you're experiencing this, but you are definitely not alone. Sending lots of love ğŸ§¡ğŸ–¤ğŸ§¡ğŸ–¤ğŸ§¡ğŸ–¤
